column4: hi can someone help me, my monitors native size is 1280 x 1024 but the maximum resolution ubuntu lets me set is 1024 x 768

hi can someone help me, my monitors native size is 1280 x 1024 but the maximum resolution ubuntu lets me set is 1024 x 768, how can i set it up so I can run this at native res
you can set the resolution by yourself. /etc/X11/xorg.conf
